mdRecord.dcterms:creator: La RouÃ«rie, Charles Armand Tuffin, marquis de, 1751-1793
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Thought by this time Congress would have paid France the three years interest due; does not understand the delay in payment; please give orders to Mr. Ferdinand Grand to pay immediately or declare that one cannot depend on the debt of America.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1788 September 15, "hotel des asturie rue de Sepulchre, St. Germaine," [France], to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
